title: Art Page of an Ost (IT HAS ACS ICONS!) (ft. The Simpsons Farting)
content:
[[include :scp-wiki:theme:black-highlighter-theme]]

[[module css]]

.icons {
    display: grid;
    grid-template-columns: repeat(5, calc((100% / 5) - 0.25rem));
    grid-gap: 0.25rem;
}

@media (max-width: 500px ) {
    .icons {
     grid-template-columns: repeat(3, calc((100% / 3) - 0.25rem));
    }
}

.icon_image {
    border-radius: 50%;
    border: 0.25rem solid  rgb(0,0,0);
    overflow: hidden;
}

.icon_name,
.icon_link {
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    justify-content: center;
    text-transform: uppercase;
}

[[/module]]

[[>]]
[[module Rate]]
[[/>]]

Esoteric classes, they are many and plentiful. A lot of them have associated ACS icons making them more usable, however a lot of them don't. I am the self-proclaimed Number One Fan of Esoteric Classes, therefore, it is my duty to make an icon for all the esoteric classes that don't currently have one. Below you can see some of the icons I have made currently. [[[esoteric-classes-complete-list|Here]]] is a reference for what they all mean, however I will put footnotes.

P.S. I'm available for PMing, either here on the wiki, or on Discord (neko.osti) (don't question my username kid), if you need an icon for your class or maybe an emblem for your department.

[[tabview]]
[[tab Established Esoteric Classes]]
[[div_ class="icons"]]

[[div_ class="icon_container"]]
[[div_ class="icon_image color-white"]]
[[image https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/local--files/art:art-page-of-an-ost-it-has-acs-icons/Acquiesce.png]]
[[/div]]
[[div_ class="icon_name"]]
acquiesce[[footnote]] Item is so big in scope or is so integrated into non-anomalous life and consensus reality, that research into viable containment methods has been deemed unnecessary. This does not necessarily mean the item is harmful or veil breaking. [[/footnote]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]

[[div_ class="icon_container"]]
[[div_ class="icon_image color-white"]]
[[image https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/local--files/art:art-page-of-an-ost-it-has-acs-icons/Aizsaule.png]]
[[/div]]
[[div_ class="icon_name"]]
aizsaule[[footnote]] Object's existence is known to the public, but its anomalous properties are not. [[/footnote]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]

[[div_ class="icon_container"]]
[[div_ class="icon_image color-white"]]
[[image https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/local--files/art:art-page-of-an-ost-it-has-acs-icons/Axiom.png]]
[[/div]]
[[div_ class="icon_name"]]
axiom[[footnote]] Item is a universal truth. [[/footnote]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]

[[div_ class="icon_container"]]
[[div_ class="icon_image color-white"]]
[[image https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/local--files/art:art-page-of-an-ost-it-has-acs-icons/Cartel.png]]
[[/div]]
[[div_ class="icon_name"]]
cartel[[footnote]] Overwatch Command have determined that the anomaly is to be uncontained. [[/footnote]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]

[[div_ class="icon_container"]]
[[div_ class="icon_image color-white"]]
[[image https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/local--files/art:art-page-of-an-ost-it-has-acs-icons/Concealed.png]]
[[/div]]
[[div_ class="icon_name"]]
concealed[[footnote]] Item is kept under a veil that should not be removed. [[/footnote]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]

[[div_ class="icon_container"]]
[[div_ class="icon_image color-white"]]
[[image https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/local--files/art:art-page-of-an-ost-it-has-acs-icons/Exempt.png]]
[[/div]]
[[div_ class="icon_name"]]
exempt[[footnote]] Item is exempt from any type of containment. [[/footnote]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]

[[div_ class="icon_container"]]
[[div_ class="icon_image color-white"]]
[[image https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/local--files/art:art-page-of-an-ost-it-has-acs-icons/Finis.png]]
[[/div]]
[[div_ class="icon_name"]]
finis[[footnote]] Item represents the end of anomalous phenomena, and therefore containment itself. [[/footnote]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]

[[div_ class="icon_container"]]
[[div_ class="icon_image color-white"]]
[[image https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/local--files/art:art-page-of-an-ost-it-has-acs-icons/Jerusalem.png]]
[[/div]]
[[div_ class="icon_name"]]
jerusalem[[footnote]] The item can be visited any time. [[/footnote]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]

[[div_ class="icon_container"]]
[[div_ class="icon_image color-white"]]
[[image https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/local--files/art:art-page-of-an-ost-it-has-acs-icons/PrimaFacie.png]]
[[/div]]
[[div_ class="icon_name"]]
prima facie[[footnote]] It is evident. [[/footnote]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]

[[div_ class="icon_container"]]
[[div_ class="icon_image color-white"]]
[[image https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/local--files/art:art-page-of-an-ost-it-has-acs-icons/Pudicitia.png]]
[[/div]]
[[div_ class="icon_name"]]
pudicitia[[footnote]] Item has been negatively affected by Foundation involvement and is now receiving aid from the Foundation. [[/footnote]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]

[[div_ class="icon_container"]]
[[div_ class="icon_image color-white"]]
[[image https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/local--files/art:art-page-of-an-ost-it-has-acs-icons/Realitatsbrecher.png]]
[[/div]]
[[div_ class="icon_name"]]
realitäts brecher[[footnote]] Item is highly unstable and can cause significant damage to reality. Containment consists of mainitaining the structure and integrity of the item. [[/footnote]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]

[[div_ class="icon_container"]]
[[div_ class="icon_image color-white"]]
[[image https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/local--files/art:art-page-of-an-ost-it-has-acs-icons/Rigorletto.png]]
[[/div]]
[[div_ class="icon_name"]]
rigoletto[[footnote]] Object's containment difficulty is contingent on opinion. [[/footnote]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]

[[div_ class="icon_container"]]
[[div_ class="icon_image color-white"]]
[[image https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/local--files/art:art-page-of-an-ost-it-has-acs-icons/Shahar.png]]
[[/div]]
[[div_ class="icon_name"]]
shahar[[footnote]] Item is causing the end of the world, however it is in the process of being resolved. [[/footnote]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]

[[div_ class="icon_container"]]
[[div_ class="icon_image color-white"]]
[[image https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/local--files/art:art-page-of-an-ost-it-has-acs-icons/Tantum.png]]
[[/div]]
[[div_ class="icon_name"]]
tantum[[footnote]] Object is used by the foundation to hide Thaumiel-class objects. [[/footnote]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]

[[div_ class="icon_container"]]
[[div_ class="icon_image color-white"]]
[[image https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/local--files/art:art-page-of-an-ost-it-has-acs-icons/Thefarting.png]]
[[/div]]
[[div_ class="icon_name"]]
the simpsons farting[[footnote]] This is a completely serious and official object class. [[/footnote]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]

[[div_ class="icon_container"]]
[[div_ class="icon_image color-white"]]
[[image https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/local--files/art:art-page-of-an-ost-it-has-acs-icons/Thoth1.png]]
[[/div]]
[[div_ class="icon_name"]]
thoth[[footnote]] Due to one reason or another, the anomalous properties of the item cannot be described. [[/footnote]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]

[[div_ class="icon_container"]]
[[div_ class="icon_image color-white"]]
[[image https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/local--files/art:art-page-of-an-ost-it-has-acs-icons/Thoth2.png]]
[[/div]]
[[div_ class="icon_name"]]
thoth alt
[[/div]]
[[/div]]

[[div_ class="icon_container"]]
[[div_ class="icon_image color-white"]]
[[image https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/local--files/art:art-page-of-an-ost-it-has-acs-icons/Volitava.png]]
[[/div]]
[[div_ class="icon_name"]]
volitava[[footnote]] Item’s containment and anomalous properties are benign, but its ongoing production by a third party poses an extreme risk to civilian life. (Made for the creator of the class) (Not by their request I just made it out of free-will to show them) [[/footnote]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]

[[/div]]
[[/tab]]
[[tab Subclasses]]
[[div_ class="icons"]]

[[div_ class="icon_container"]]
[[div_ class="icon_image color-white"]]
[[image https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/local--files/art:art-page-of-an-ost-it-has-acs-icons/Eschaton.png]]
[[/div]]
[[div_ class="icon_name"]]
eschaton[[footnote]] Item must be put in a box that can't be opened. [[/footnote]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]

[[/div]]
[[/tab]]
[[tab Informal Classes]]
[[div_ class="icons"]]

[[div_ class="icon_container"]]
[[div_ class="icon_image color-white"]]
[[image https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/local--files/art:art-page-of-an-ost-it-has-acs-icons/Oblique.png]]
[[/div]]
[[div_ class="icon_name"]]
oblique[[footnote]] Containment is futile, and you should run away as fast as possible! [[/footnote]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]

[[div_ class="icon_container"]]
[[div_ class="icon_image color-white"]]
[[image https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/local--files/art:art-page-of-an-ost-it-has-acs-icons/Saoshyant.png]]
[[/div]]
[[div_ class="icon_name"]]
saoshyant[[footnote]] Item acts as the foundation's patron deity. [[/footnote]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]

[[div_ class="icon_container"]]
[[div_ class="icon_image color-white"]]
[[image https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/local--files/art:art-page-of-an-ost-it-has-acs-icons/fiftythree.png]]
[[/div]]
[[div_ class="icon_name"]]
53[[footnote]] Item is highly intrusive, has unknown capabilities and an unknown nature. [[/footnote]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]

[[/div]]
[[/tab]]
[[/tabview]]
